name: (9) Dresscode - Not from this World!
description:
A Game by Hannah Pollow, with great Programming Support by Jörg Sroka!
This Game was made for the "GAME A WEEK" Projectcourse, supervised by Csongor Baranyai in the Summer Semester 2019. 
---
In this Game you can dress an Alien! This is something you ever wanted but knew about it! Go play and decide between different handdrawn Outfits for your Alien. Have fun and share your funny creations. 

--- Planning to add more! --- 

Made in Unity3D and the Sprites in Adobe Photoshop 2018

Be entertained by funny outfits
Be happy about putting together an Outfit 
Be the One with the most stylistic Alien on this Planet.... Because HE IS NOT FROM THIS WORLD....da da daaaaaa.... 

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" Summer Semester 2019)
